memberdef.name: TRY_ASSIGN
memberdef.initializer: if (info == typeid(type)) { \ const type *val = static_cast<const type*>(p); \ self->var = *val; \ self->size = sizeof(type); \ return; \ }

memberdef.name: TRY_CONVERT_TO
memberdef.initializer: if (info == typeid(type)) { \ type* out = static_cast<type*>(p); \ *out = self->var.convert<type>(); \ return; \ }
